name: SpinOffLite
description:
Try to match colored balls to each other to earn points. Match them to the same color 2x bonus ball for even more points. Special balls help when you are in a jam. Finger pads on the left and right side of the screen allow you to rotate balls around the center point.

Using both fingers you can actually throw balls off of the center point but watch out! If a ball strikes the outer edge its all over.

Customizable backgrounds, music, borders, and text allow you to choose how the game looks and sounds.

Five different modes of play include Clockwise, Random, Cross-Fire, Multi-Ball, and Rapid Fire.
